channel.title: Ubuntu - GFX Card Problem
channel.description:
I've tried and tried to get Ubuntu working (details soon), and I've looked around and realized many people are experiencing the same problem as I am; the item we had in common was our graphics card. I've got an ATI RADEON XPRESS 200 Series.
I've install Ubuntu perfectly fine. I see the login screen, and when I attempt to login, the screen goes black-ish (as if it's going well), then after a few seconds it returns to the login screen. No error message is supplied.
If the problem really is my GFX card, would any body care to provide a solution?
I'm eager to get Ubuntu working as Windows is getting too slow. Thanks in advance.
EDIT: If it makes a difference, I am dual-booting with Windows XP.
